src:
投票》您認為 誰在操作網軍？
04 Nov 2019, 03:12 by CTnews網路投票頻道 ivoting, https://www.facebook.com/wownewnews/
PTT帳號部近1個月清除千餘個網軍帳號，多數網友認為被清除的帳號過去發言都挺民進黨。但民進黨卻常高喊「假新聞」、「假消息」，批評藍營刻意在網路製造不利民進黨的假消息，操作網軍。
請問，你覺得到底誰最會操作網軍？
※ ivoting是提供用戶表達個人對議題的意見，投票結果無任何立場與傾向，也不會主動提供給任何政府機關或團體做為立法或修法的依據。如有試圖以任何駭客行為影響正常投票結果，一律依法究辦。
投票開始時間： 2019/11/04 11:01 至 2019/11/05 12:00

民進黨。
國民黨。
不知道／無意見。

看結果 總投票數：8356
text:
Vote "Who do you think is operating the Net Army?
04 Nov 2019, 03:12 by CTnews online voting channel ivoting, https://www.facebook.com/wownewnews/
The PTT account department cleared more than a thousand network army accounts in the past month. Most netizens thought that the cleared accounts were quite popular in the past. However, the DPP often shouted "fake news" and "fake news" and criticized the blue camp for deliberately making fake news about the DPP in the Internet and operating the network army.
Excuse me, who do you think will most be used to operate the Net Army?
※ ivoting is to provide users with opinions on personal issues. The voting results have no position or inclination, and they will not be offered to any government agency or group as the basis for legislation or amendment. If there is an attempt to influence the normal voting result by any hacking behavior, it will be handled according to law.
Voting start time: 2019/11/04 11:01 to 2019/11/05 12:00

Democratic Progressive Party.
Kuomintang.
Don't know / no opinion.

See results Total votes: 8356
